This request is a natural consequence of Egypt's long-standing policy of seeking the restitution of all archaeological and historical artifacts that have been taken illicitly out of the country, it said. Zahi Hawass has campaigned to repatriate several pharaonic treasures in recent years, including the Rosetta Stone now in the British Museum. Egypt's Supreme Council of

Guido pursued the political power nexus between News Corp and the David Cameron clan with the same vigour he employs to uncover politicians' secrets?`` The BBC is the pervasive influence on our society,'' he argues. It is monolithic and uses all of its old-school-tie contacts. Jeremy Clarkson don't think Rebekah Brooks comes from that background. At least with Murdoch you know where you stand. The Guardian targeted Andy Coulson over the phone-hacking affair`` as a proxy because you all hate News International,'' he claims. Current CEO Eric Schmidt will be executive chairman, and co-founder Sergey Brin will remain co-founder, devoting`` his time and energy to strategic projects,'' Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post.
